code: import React,{Component}from"react";import"./sorts.css";import SortCard from"./SortCard/SortCard";import data from"../../data/main_sorts.json";import Fedor from"./img/Федор.jpg";import Mone from"./img/Монэ.jpg";import Vek from"./img/Век.jpg";import Alex from"./img/Алексеич.jpg";import Tavr from"./img/Таврида.jpg";import Kuban from"./img/Кубань.jpg";import T_150 from"./img/Т 150.jpg";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const images={"Федор":Fedor,"Монэ":Mone,"Век":Vek,"Алексеич":Alex,"Таврида":Tavr,"Кубань":Kuban,"Т 150":T_150};class Sorts extends Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.state={sorts:[],cur_card:null};this.setCurCard=this.setCurCard.bind(this);}componentDidMount(){data.map(item=>{item.image_path=images[item.name];});this.setState({sorts:data});}setCurCard(value){this.setState(state=>({cur_card:value}));}render(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sorts",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list",children:this.state.sorts.map((item,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{onClick:()=>{this.setCurCard(index);},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image_path}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"name",children:item.name})]})},index);})}),this.state.cur_card==null?"":/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SortCard,{data:this.state.sorts[this.state.cur_card],setCurCard:this.setCurCard})]});}}export default Sorts;
